title: Obituary: Belgium Soprano Jodie Devos Dies at 35
creator: Francisco Salazar
content: On June 16, 2024, soprano Jodie Devos died at 35. According to reports , the soprano died from cancer in Paris. Born on Oct. 10, 1988, in Libramont-Chevigny, Belgium, Devos studied at the Institut de Musique et de Pédagogie in Namur and at the Royal Academy of Music in London. In 2014, she went on to win second prize and the audience prize at the Queen Elisabeth Competition. In 2015, she became an honorary citizen of Namur. title: Veltroni promuove Motta: «Anche Conte e Lippi prima della Juve non avevano allenato grandi squadre, di solito...»
creator: Redazione JuventusNews24
content: Il giornalista, ex politico e noto tifoso della Juventus , Walter Veltroni, a TuttiConvocati, ha parlato dell’arrivo alla Vecchia Signora di Thiago Motta , paragonandolo a due grandi ex tecnici del passato. THIAGO MOTTA HA POCA ESPERIENZA – « Anche Conte e Lippi prima della Juve non avevano allenato grandi squadre, di solito questi sono gli allenatori più motivati poi quando ci arrivano e possono mettere nella testa dei giocatori l’idea giusta».

title: Minaccia agenti con ascia davanti stadio Amburgo, ferito
content: La polizia di Amburgo ha sparato eferito un uomo che li minacciava con un'ascia davanti allostadio Volksparkstadion dove alle 15 si gioca il match traPolonia-Olanda che aprirà la prima giornata del gruppo D degliEuropei 2024. Lo riferisce la Bbc online. Al momento è in corsouna vasta operazione della polizia. Secondo quanto riportato daimedia, l'incidente è avvenuto nei pressi di una zona riservataai tifosi della squadra di calcio olandese.Un comunicato dellapolizia afferma che l'uomo ha...

title: कब है निर्जला एकादशी, क्या हैं इस व्रत के नियम? पंडितजी से जानें महत्व
creator: News18 Hindi
content: जितेन्द्र/फरीदाबाद .हिंदू धर्म में वैसे तो सभी एकादशी का व्रत रखना बहुत शुभ माना जाता है. निर्जला एकादशी विशेष करके लाभकारी मानी जाती है. वहीं, पंडित सीता राम ने बताया कि ज्येष्ठ मास की शुक्ल पक्ष में पड़ने वाली एकादशी को निर्जला एकादशी कहा जाता है. इस दिन भगवान विष्णु की आराधना की जाती है. उनका आशीर्वाद पाने के लिए निर्जला, यानी की बिना पानी पिए व्रत रखना पड़ता है. धार्मिक मान्यता के अनुसार, यदि किसी साधक के साल भर कोई भी व्रत नहीं रखा है. वह निर्जला एकादशी का व्रत रख लेता है. उसे अन्य सभी...

title: Шофьор на автобус причини катастрофа на АМ "Тракия", след като отне предимството на моторист
content: За катастрофа между автобус и мотор на автомагистрала "Тракия" съобщиха за БТА от пресцентъра на Областната дирекция на МВР - Пловдив. Пътният инцидент е станал на разклона на пловдивското село Царацово. Сигнал за случилото се е подаден около 14:30 часа на телефон 112. Катастрофата е причинена заради отнето предимство по вина на водача на автобуса при ляв завой. Мотористът и неговата спътничка са откарани за преглед в болнично заведение. Очакват се резултати. Към момента пътят на мястото на...

title: Tinubu Celebrates Fathers On Father’s Day
creator: Enioluwa Adeniyi
content: President Bola Tinubu , on Sunday, commended fathers for their sacrifice and resilience in shaping the Nigeria’s future. The President charged fathers to remain committed to shaping the futures of the next generation. Tinubu made this call in a statement released through his Special Adviser on Media and Publicity, Ajuri Ngelale, in commemorating the 2024 Father’s Day. The statement read in part, “On the occasion of Father’s Day, President Bola Tinubu congratulates fathers, including all...

title: Полиция в Гамбурге открыла огонь по мужчине с топором во время шествия болельщиков
creator: Анастасия Мокшанова
content: Полиция в немецком Гамбурге открыла огонь по мужчине с топором в ходе шествия футбольных болельщиков перед матчем турнира Евро-2024. Об этом 16 июня сообщает Bild . «После того, как полицейские попросили мужчину положить инструмент, они применили против него перцовый баллончик, а затем огнестрельное оружие. По данным полиции, сначала полицейский произвел лишь предупредительный выстрел, чтобы остановить нападавшего. Затем прозвучало несколько выстрелов, пока мужчина наконец не упал на...

title: Държавата погна човек на Слави Трифонов за пари
content: Кадър Ютуб Известният актьор Мариан Бачев, който дълги години се подвизаваше в екипа на Слави Трифонов, е бил погнат от НАП, пише Блиц. Това разкри самият той в профила си в социалната мрежа, където се удиви от задълженията си. По думите на комика, сумата, която дължал на държавата била точно 1,89 лв. Точно така! Ето какво споделя самият той за казуса: "НЕ Е ШЕГА: УВЕДОМЛЕНИЕ ОТ НАП: Уведомяваме Ви, че имате неплатено задължение в размер под 20 лв. Независимо, че дължимата сума не е голяма,...

title: Macron calling snap elections could leave France in chaos, Sarkozy warns
creator: Jennifer Rankin
content: Emmanuel Macron has been warned by a former French president that his decision to call snap elections could plunge France into chaos, as his centrist party languishes third in opinion polls, far behind the far-right National Rally. Nicolas Sarkozy said dissolving the national assembly was “a major risk” for France, “because it could plunge it into chaos, from which it will have the greatest difficulty emerging”. “‘Giving the floor to the French people’ to justify the dissolution is a curious...

title: Día del Padre: Hombre muere en la avenida Javier Prado tras terrible accidente (VIDEO)
creator: Redacción PERÚ21
content: Lamentablemente, esta madrugada del Día del Padre fue la última para un conductor que se estrelló a gran velocidad volcando su unidad sobre la berma central de la avenida Javier Prado. Todo ocurrió alrededor de la una de la mañana de este domingo 16, entre las avenidas Petit Thouars y la Prolongación de Iquitos, cuando el auto impactó un poste y la varanda dando vueltas en campana. Terminó de cabeza, pero aún con vida, según le contó un testigo a Latina. Él habría intentado...

title: Vége a huzavonának: kicserélik a svájciak edzőpályáját
content: A svájciak vasárnap egy közleményben osztották meg, hogy új pályára helyezik a központukat. „Az UEFA segít nekünk lecserélni a gyepet a waldaui edzőstadionunkban. A fű gyökerei több helyen elhaltak, ezért hétfőn és kedden a VFB Stuttgart edzőpályáján fogunk edzeni a Robert-Schlienz-Stadionban, amely megfelelő állapotban van” – olvasható a svájciak közleményében. „A skót meccset követően a tervek szerint a Stadion auf der Waldau új pályáján edzhetünk....

title: Sport für die Jüngsten in Wermelskirchen: 120 Kinder legen Bewegungsabzeichen ab
creator: Theresa Demski
content: Laufen, Werfen, Springen und Ausdauer: Kinder ab sechs Jahren können für das Sportabzeichen antreten. Im vergangenen Jahr sammelten in viele Jungen und Mädchen Punkte in den Disziplinen. Kindergartenkinder allerdings sind von dem Programm noch ausgenommen: In Nordrhein-Westfalen ist deswegen ein spielerischer Wettbewerb entstanden, mit dem Jungen und Mädchen im Kindergartenalter ein Kinderbewegungsabzeichen („Kibaz“) erwerben können – samt Urkunde. „Das Programm soll Drei- bis...

title: Großer Leistungsnachweis in Goch: Hier zeigen die Feuerwehren im Kreis Kleve ihr Können
creator: Stephan Derks
content: Bereits in den frühen Morgenstunden herrschte am vergangenen Wochenende reges Treiben auf dem Gocher Friedensplatz. Denn dort, wo ansonsten Reisemobilisten Station machen, um ihre Seele baumeln zu lassen, strömten am Samstag zahlreich Besucher herbei, um die Fähigkeiten der Freiwilligen Feuerwehren des Kreises Kleve im Rahmen des 45. Leistungsnachweises live mitzuerleben.

title: Union Home Minister Amit Shah orders Kashmir-like 'zero-terror plans' in Jammu
creator: Prashant Tamta
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Sunday directed security agencies to implement area domination and zero-terror plans in the Jammu division like they did in Kashmir to achieve success. He also said the Narendra Modi government is committed to set an example by cracking down on terrorists in Jammu and Kashmir through innovative means. These were conveyed to officials by the home minister at a high-level meeting convened to review the security situation in Jammu and Kashmir in the wake of the...

title: Романо: экс-игрок ЦСКА Эджуке перейдёт в «Севилью» на правах свободного агента
creator: RT на русском
content: Как сообщает журналист Фабрицио Романо в социальных сетях, у нигерийского хавбека закончился контракт с армейским клубом из-за приостановок по правилу ФИФА, поэтому футболист перейдёт в клуб Ла Лиги бесплатно. Сезон-2023/24 нигериец провёл в аренде в «Антверпене». Всего он сыграл в 39 матчах, забил пять мячей и отдал шесть голевых передач. Контракт Эджуке с красно-синими рассчитан до конца июня 2024 года. Ранее сообщалось , что ЦСКА согласовал переход Шуманского из «Ариса».

title: Incredible Fiat-style BOAT based off iconic model is finally unveiled – complete with its own ladder and fishing gear
creator: Jacob Jaffa
content: A MAJOR manufacturer has unveiled its bizarre new boat-car based on an iconic model, complete with a bevy of bonus equipment. Only 500 semi-aquatic crossover models are being made by a specialist firm in Monaco. Fiat has been relentless over the years in its efforts to reinvent the beloved 500 supermini . The Italian company has produced every possible variant, from hot hatches to hybrids to fully-electric models - or so we thought. However, even the most ardent Fiat enthusiasts would have been...

title: Mauzé-sur-le-Mignon : les collégiens dans un simulateur d’accident de bus
content: Une expérience inédite dans le département s’est déroulée au sein de trois établissements dont le collège René-Caillié de Mauzé-sur-le-Mignon, mercredi 22 mai. Il s’agissait de prévention et de sensibilisation destinées aux classes de 6 e avec une mise en situation réelle du renversement d’un car sur le côté. L’opération était confiée au Centre de formation Agora entreprise, en partenariat avec Niort agglo et la société Transdev, chargée des transports scolaires, avec pour...

title: In pics: Muslims celebrate Eid ul-Adha in Gulf, other parts of world
content: Eid Al Adha, also known as the festival of sacrifice, was celebrated by millions of Muslims across Gulf countries and the world on Sunday, June 16. Eid Al-Adha or Bakrid is a holy occasion also called the ‘festival of sacrifice’ and is celebrated on the 10th day of Dhu al-Hijjah, the 12th month of the Islamic or lunar calendar. This significant Islamic holiday commemorates joy and peace, where people celebrate with their families, let go of past grudges, and make meaningful connections. It is...

title: Rajkot: ખીરસરા ગામે ગુરુકુળ ચલાવતા ધર્મ સ્વરૂપ સ્વામી વિરુદ્ધ મહિલાએ દુષ્કર્મની ફરિયાદ નોંધાવી
creator: abp asmita
content: રાજકોટમાં ભાયાવદર પાસે ખીરસરા અને ઘટીયા ગામ વચ્ચે આવેલ સ્વામિનારાયણ ગુરુકુળના બે સંતો વિરુદ્ધ ફરિયાદ. રાજકોટની મહિલાએ ધરમસ્વરૂપદાસ સ્વામી, નારાયણ સ્વરૂપદાસ સ્વામી તેમજ અન્ય એક વ્યક્તિ મયુરભાઇ કાસોદરીયા વિરુદ્ધ ફરિયાદ નોંધાવી છે. છેલ્લા ત્રણ વર્ષથી સંતો દુષ્કૃત્ય આચરતા હોવાના આરોપ સાથે ફરિયાદ કરવામાં આવી છે. આરોપ છે કે પ્રેમજાળમાં ફસાવી, ખોટા લગ્નનું નાટક કરી ઈચ્છા વિરુદ્ધ અવારનવાર શારીરિક સંબંધ બાંધ્યા..હાલ તો પોલીસે સમગ્ર મામલે વધુ તપાસ શરૂ કરી છે. જો કે ગુરુકુળના શિક્ષકનું કહેવું છે કે હજુ...

title: Odisha CM Mohan Majhi Interacts With People, Assures Of Rapid Growth In 5 Years
creator: OB Bureau
content: Bhubaneswar: Odisha’s newly elected chief minister Mohan Charan Majhi on Sunday said his government would ensure rapid development of the state in next five years. Majhi interacted with the people for the first time after assuming power at the State Guest House where the chief minister’s office is operating temporarily. “The previous government failed to deliver as it was not connected to the people and their problems. But all the leaders of BJP, who have been elected in the election, have come...

title: 80 countries agree territorial integrity of Ukraine must be basis of peace deal
content: The joint communique on Sunday capped a two-day conference at the Burgenstock resort in Switzerland marked by the absence of Russia, which was not invited, but that many attendees hoped could join in on a road map to peace. About 100 delegations, mostly Western countries but also some key developing nations, took part in the conference – and experts were watching to see how and if at all they might line up behind the outcome document. Participants India, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab...

title: 80 countries agree territorial integrity of Ukraine must be basis of peace deal
content: Eighty countries have jointly called for the “territorial integrity” of Ukraine to be the basis for any peace agreement to end Russia’s war, though some key developing nations at a Swiss conference did not sign up. The joint communique on Sunday capped a two-day conference at the Burgenstock resort in Switzerland marked by the absence of Russia, which was not invited, but that many attendees hoped could join in on a road map to peace. title: “Quelle torture” : Sheryfa Luna (La Perle) éliminée de Mask Singer, elle sort du silence sur Instagram
content: Un mois et demi après le lancement de la saison 6 de Mask Singer, Sheryfa Luna, cachée sous le costume de la Perle, a été démasquée aux portes de la finale. Sur Instagram, la chanteuse réagit à son élimination de la compétition. Début mai, TF1 lançait sur sa chaîne la nouvelle saison de Mask Singer . Dans cette sixième édition de l'émission de divertissement, les membres du jury – Kev Adams , Ines Reg , Chantal Ladesou et Laurent Ruquier – mènent l'enquête sans relâche pour...

title: خطباء مصليات العيد في العاصمة عدن يدعون لمساندة حملة التطعيم ضد مرض شلل الأطفال
content: أدت جموع غفيرة من أبناء العاصمة عدن، اليوم الأحد صلاة عيد الأضحى في مصليات العيد في مديريات العاصمة عدن. وهنأ خطباء العيد، في مستهل خطبهم، المصلين بحلول عيد الأضحى المبارك، راجيين من الله العلي القدير أن يعيده على الأمتين العربية والإسلامية بالخير واليُمن والبركات. وحثّ خطباء صلاة العيد، أبناء العاصمة عدن لمساندة حملات التطعيم ضد مرض شلل الأطفال. كما حثوا الآباء وكل من له ولاية للقيام بواجبهم تجاه أبناءهم، وتحمل الأمانة، والدفع بتحصين الأطفال ضد مرض شلل الأطفال، حفاظًا على...

title: Streetfood-Festival in Wassenberg: Von Eingemachtem, Pommes und Musik
creator: Willi Spichartz
content: Das könnte was werden: Das erste Wassenberger „Street-Food-Drink-Music-Festival“ am Wochenende auf und am Roßtorplatz macht Initiator und Organisator Heinz-Josef Schümmer und seinen Helfern Mut, im nächsten Jahr eine Neuauflage anzugehen: „Wir sind zufrieden, obwohl nicht alle Rahmenbedingungen optimal waren! Wir lernen aber!“ Street-Food-Festivals haben seit der Premiere in Köln 2014 in Deutschland erheblich Fuß gefasst, sie waren für Heinz-Josef Schümmer Anlass, zu seinem persönlichen...

title: Un triathlète de 24 ans fait un arrêt cardiaque à l’Ironman de Nice
content: Un piéton gravement blessé après avoir été percuté par un triathlète de l’Ironman à Nice

title: Northerly breezes for Father's Day
content: Mainly sunny skies and seasonable temperatures are on tap for Sunday, but Northerly breezes will increase the the fire danger. A Red Flag Warning remains in place through 8:00 pm Monday for the northern and western portions of the Sacramento Valley. Please be extra cautious when using grills and smokers on this Father's Day. Temperatures will be below normal and very comfortable on Monday, but a warming trend is in store for the rest of the week with highs reaching the upper 90s by next weekend.

title: Britain's July 4 election is fast approaching. Rishi Sunak is running out of time to change the tune
creator: JILL LAWLESS
content: LONDON — With less than three weeks until Britain's election day, Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is running out of time to change an ominous tune for his Conservative Party. title: Ne smiruje se, stiglo novo upozorenje: Navijači, napustite područje, što pre
content: Belgijski policajac i stručnjak za navijače izjavio je da tamo uopšte nije bezbedno. "Upotreba teških droga na ulici je normalna. Prolaznici su maltretirani, narkomani traže novac. Strani mediji to područje opisuju kao zemlju zombija, a to je upravo ono što jeste. Tamo nije bezbedno", rekao je on i poslao upozorenje svim belgijskim navijačima: "Molimo navijače da napuste područje stanice što je pre moguće".

title: 7 знака, че някой се опитва да ви унижи
content: Снимка: Istock Всеки ден общуваме с различни хора. Роднини, колеги, приятели, интимен партньор. Взаимоотношенията с тези хора ни карат да се чувстваме по различен начин през различните етапи на познанството ни. С някои е приятно, дават ни мотивация, докато други постоянно се опитват да ни унижат. Това емоционално малтретиране невинаги е видимо. Често можем да не го забележим. Да си кажем, че другият така си говори. Особено лесно е да бъдем заблудени, когато става въпрос за любовна връзка. Може...

title: Paul Brian, whose baritone pipes discussed all things automative as radio host of Drive Chicago, dies at 73
content: Paul Brian’s signature baritone was a fixture to millions of radio listeners in Chicago for decades. He mostly talked about his favorite thing — cars. As the host of the Saturday morning program “Drive Chicago” for more than 20 years on WLS-AM (890), he took listener calls and discussed everything from hubcaps to automotive nostalgia. He stayed away from trouble shooting car problems — he wasn’t good under the hood. Mr. Brian died June 11 after a short illness. He was 73. “If you grew up in...

content: NAIROBI, Kenya, June 16 – Muslim faithful gathered at mosques and open prayer grounds across Kenya Sunday to observe the Idd ul-Adha prayers, a key religious festival marking the culmination of the Hajj pilgrimage to Mecca.
